text:
Really nice ambiance such a pretty place to chill. Perfect for late night hangouts since they’re open till 1AM, which is a big plus.

However, the menu is quite limited. Not many choices for drinks or snacks. They only had fries and pasta when I went. Would be great if they could add more side dishes like cakes or curry puffs.

If they had shisha, it’d be even better! Definitely a nice spot to relax, just hoping to see more variety in the future.
Had strawberry choc - my favvvvv sedap sangat! 100/10 & fries - also sedap! Place comfortable & tenang gila! Staff are all friendly. Definitely will come again!!!

I’d give this place a full score for its wonderful atmosphere—it’s a really nice spot to chill. The coffee was okay, not too bad. They serve food too, though it would be helpful to have a display showing what’s available. I wanted to order something, but the staff mentioned there would be a bit of a wait not advisable. so I ended up just having coffee. Would I return? Possibly not, if it only for the ambiance.

Replying to Cartboy:
Hi Cartboy, thank you for responding to my review! I really appreciate it. I hope you’ll be able to keep improving and be well-prepared for more customers in the future. It’s such a great spot to relax, and look forward to seeing more positive reviews in future.
I tried their coffee here. Not really a coffee lover so can’t comment on that but it taste nice for me. I love the vibe and atmosphere that this place have. Good place to have a drink and chill.
Outdoor and relaxing vibes. Suitable for couples and group of friends to chill. Both pasta was good. Aglio olio beef was 100/10. Definitely will repeat this!
